channel.title: problem installing whonix in virtualbox
channel.description:
I installed VirtualBox and then followed the usual steps to import appliance for Whonix. I then started the gateway. The window pops up but it's permanently black and nothing appears to be happening. Left it alone for 20 minutes. Still nothing. Uninstalled everything, tried again. Same thing.
Using HP Zen Book with Windows 10.
Thanks in advance.
